0.text: Innate: Fiora identifies the Vitals of nearby  visible enemy champions, marked as an arc around themselves. Vitals take 1.75 seconds to become targetable and linger for 13.25 seconds afterwards while Fiora remains near the target, otherwise the Vital will disappear. After a Vital ends, Fiora identifies a new one on her target.

1.text: Fiora's damage against a Vital will trigger it to deal 3% (+ 5.5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health  bonus true damage,  heal Fiora for 40 − 115 (based on level) and grant her 20 / 30 / 40 / 50% (based on  Grand Challenge's Rank)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: Fiora  dashes a short distance in the target direction and then stabs a nearby enemy. Lunge can hit structures and  wards. Stabbing a target reduces Lunge's  cooldown by 50%.

1.text: The stab deals physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

2.text: Fiora can cast any of her abilities while  dashing.

3.text: Lunge hits enemies regardless of whether Fiora has  sight of them.

0.text: Active: Fiora enters a defensive stance for 0.75 seconds, becoming  unable to act but preventing the application of all non- turret damage to her and gaining  debuff immunity and  crowd control immunity.

1.text: Additionally, over the first 0.6 seconds of the duration, Fiora poises to strike, after which she sends a shock with her sword in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit until colliding with an enemy champion.

2.text: The enemy champion struck is also  slowed and  crippled by 50% for 2 seconds. If Riposte negates at least one hostile  immobilizing effect, Fiora  stuns the target for the same duration instead.

0.text: Active: Fiora's next two basic attacks  on-attack within 4 seconds gain  25 bonus range and  bonus attack speed.

1.text: The first attack  slows the target by 30% for 1 second but cannot  critically strike. The second attack will  critically strike for  modified critical damage (including to  structures).

2.text: Bladework  resets Fiora's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive:  Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed is increased.

1.text: Active: Fiora challenges the target enemy champion for 8 seconds, highlighting all four of their Vitals after a 0.5-second delay. While in effect,  Duelist's Dance does not identify new Vitals on Fiora's target.

2.text: While near the target, Fiora gains  Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed.

3.text: If Fiora triggers at least one Vital before the target  dies, or triggers all four, she creates a  Victory Zone at their location for 2 − 5 (based on Vitals hit) seconds, which  heals Fiora and all allies within the area every second.

4.text: Unlike  Duelist's Dance, the Vitals will continue to linger even if Fiora is not nearby.

1.concerningText: The stab deals physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

2.concerningText: Additionally, over the first 0.6 seconds of the duration, Fiora poises to strike, after which she sends a shock with her sword in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit until colliding with an enemy champion.

3.concerningText: Active: Fiora's next two basic attacks  on-attack within 4 seconds gain  25 bonus range and  bonus attack speed.
The first attack  slows the target by 30% for 1 second but cannot  critically strike. The second attack will  critically strike for  modified critical damage (including to  structures).

4.concerningText: Passive:  Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed is increased.

If Fiora triggers at least one Vital before the target  dies, or triggers all four, she creates a  Victory Zone at their location for 2 − 5 (based on Vitals hit) seconds, which  heals Fiora and all allies within the area every second.

0.concerningText: The stab deals physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

Additionally, over the first 0.6 seconds of the duration, Fiora poises to strike, after which she sends a shock with her sword in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit until colliding with an enemy champion.

1.concerningText: The first attack  slows the target by 30% for 1 second but cannot  critically strike. The second attack will  critically strike for  modified critical damage (including to  structures).

Stats

+50 attack damage
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
